Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Involuntary loss of URINE, such as leaking of urine. It is a symptom of various underlying pathological processes. Major types of incontinence include URINARY URGE INCONTINENCE and URINARY STRESS INCONTINENCE.
